system.description: While you're Staggered, all your melee attacks become True and Overwhelming.
system.flavor: The Martyr rejoices in the glory of combat. You ready your weapon, and engage in violence. Your wounds only make you stronger. IN VIOLENCE YOU ARE BORN AND IN VIOLENCE YOU WILL PERISH. YOUR FURY IS A FIRE THAT CANNOT BE EXTINGUISHED, IT SHINES IN THE VOID AFTER THE END OF CREATION. REMEMBER THIS, MARTYR: WHEN PEACE IS ACHIEVED, YOU WILL CEASE TO EXIST. LET US ACHIEVE BLISS, THEN.
